page.title: 06A DAY IN MY LIFE, BARNSTAPLE
page.content:
I woke up in the morning and felt ill so I didn't go to school. I dozed most of the day.I had dinner at 12 o'clock then did a puzzle.When my sister returned from school I went to see my gran and grandad.I stayed for a while then came home and went to sleep.
May 11th 1985 was quite an easy day for me.My son who was unwell stayed home from school.After my daughter went to school I washed the dishes, made the beds and took the dog for a walk .My son and I had lunch and then he did a jigsaw puzzle .We had our evening meal and then went to see my parents.The children went to bed at nine. I watched television and went to bed around eleven.
